resources.string: Q1: Unable to register with my email?

A1: Reasons-
1. Email is already in use
2. Email is not valid

Fix-
1. Make sure your email is valid, and try using casual domains like- google.com
Q2: Unable to use the username I want to?

A2: Reasons-
1. Username is already in use
2. Username is not valid

Fix-
1. Avoid using special characters like: (!, @, #, $) etc,.

1. SignUp/Create an account if you don't have one.
2. Login with your email and password.
3. To contact/communicate with your friends you can either make your star or join their. You can also invite them in yours.
4. You can chat with them 24/7.

NOTE: The Database could be exploited and the chats could be read by someone as they are not encrypted. Ultimately your password would be safe (NOT GUARANTEED).
